pages.sheetWorkflow.title: Sheet Workflow
input.helper.sheetWorkflow.vox: Does the sheet number start with «VOX»?
input.label.sheetWorkflow.label: Sheet Number
input.helper.sheetWorkflow.label: Enter the number you stamped on the sheet.
input.helper.sheetWorkflow.source: Enter the letters on the top right of the sheet.
input.helper.sheetWorkflow.signatureCoun: Count all signatures on the sheet.
input.helper.sheetWorkflow.commune: Type the postal code to find the commune. If the commune is not found, set the sheet aside.
notifications.sheetWorkflow.labelExists: A sheet with this number already exists.
notifications.sheetWorkflow.labelExistsB: Please check the number and try again. If it doesn't work, set the sheet aside.
pages.sheetWorkflow.moreInformation.desc: If you have contacts on your sheet who have checked the 'More Information' field, you can enter the information here. Click 'Add Contact' to add a new contact.
